Title: ‘China’s relationship with India lies in India’s external environment’

Title: ‘Shared concerns about Beijing have driven India and the US closer’

Title: ‘India is at the front and centre of America’s engagement in the region’

Description: When one contemplates the world today, it’s important to first understand what it is not. It is not cold war 2.0 because you don’t have that kind of sharp military confrontation that the Cold War did. The systems are not as firewalled as they were in that era.
